content: You can specify the number of files / folders displayed on one page, as well as specify which page to start displaying

comment.text: "This translation key is used for the tooltip that explains how to customize the number of files/folders displayed on a page and specifies which page to display."

usage.context:
<Label className="label" text={t("ItemsCount")} />
 <HelpButton
 offsetRight={0}
 size={12}
 tooltipContent={
 <Text fontSize="12px">{t("ItemsCountDescription")}</Text>
 }
 dataTestId="items_count_help_button"
 />
 </LabelGroup>
 <TextInput

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a semicolon (;) where a conjunction (and/or) might be more natural in Azerbaijani. While not strictly incorrect, it can make the sentence feel slightly clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Səhifədə göstərilən faylların/qovluqların sayını təyin edə bilərsiniz, eləcə də hansı səhifənin göstərilməyə başlayacağını.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'факлове' is likely a misspelling of 'файлове'. 'Факлове' translates to 'torches' in Bulgarian, which is not the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: файлове

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "die Seite festlegen, die angezeigt werden soll" is a bit awkward and verbose in German. It literally translates to 'specify the page that should be displayed.' A more natural phrasing would be something like 'die anzuzeigende Seite'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sie können die Anzahl der Dateien/Ordner festlegen, die auf einer Seite angezeigt werden sollen, sowie die anzuzeigende Seite.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "qué página debe empezar a mostrarse" is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "qué página se debe mostrar".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: qué página se debe mostrar

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'quale pagina viene visualizzata' is a literal translation of 'which page to start displaying' and doesn't convey the intended meaning accurately. It implies the user is seeing *which* page is displayed, rather than specifying the starting page.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: È possibile specificare il numero di file/cartelle visualizzate in una pagina, nonché specificare la pagina di partenza.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "You can specify the number of files / folders displayed on one page" is not fully captured. The Japanese translation focuses solely on specifying the *number* but doesn't explicitly mention the ability to *display* them.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 1ページに表示するファイル/フォルダの数を指定でき、それぞれのページを表示できます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "as well as specify which page to start displaying" is somewhat awkwardly translated. The connection between specifying the number and specifying the starting page isn't as clear.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: また、表示を開始するページも指定できます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word '디스플레이' (dispeullei) is a transliteration of 'display' and isn't the most natural Korean term in this context. A more appropriate term would be '표시' (pyojeo).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 한 페이지에 표시 되는 파일 / 폴더 수와 표시를 시작할 페이지를 지정할 수 있습니다

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses Lao script that is not consistently spaced. It looks cramped and difficult to read.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent spacing between words and punctuation marks to improve readability. For example, add spaces after commas and before conjunctions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "kuru lapu sākt rādīt" is a literal translation of "which page to start displaying" but sounds unnatural in Latvian. A more natural phrasing would be something like "no kādas lapas sākt rādīt".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: no kādas lapas sākt rādīt

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit clunky. The repetition of 'opgeven' (specify) makes the sentence feel less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: U kunt het aantal bestanden/mappen per pagina instellen en de startpagina bepalen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "que deve começar a ser apresentada" is awkward and doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of "which page to start displaying".  It implies a forced starting point rather than a selection.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "qual página iniciar a exibição" or "qual página começar a mostrar".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'număr de pagină de început afișaj' is grammatically awkward. 'Afișaj' is unnecessary and the phrase doesn't flow naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puteți indica numărul fișierelor / folderelor pe o pagină, precum și pagina de început a afișajului.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'număr de pagină de început afișaj' attempts to convey 'which page to start displaying', it's not idiomatic Romanian. The phrasing is overly literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Puteți indica numărul fișierelor / folderelor pe o pagină, precum și pagina de început a afișajului.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ඔබට එක් පිටුවක පෙන්වන ගොනු / බහාලුම් ගණන දැක්වීමට හැකි අතර" is a bit literal and awkward. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning of specifying the number of files/folders per page.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට එක් පිටුවක ප්‍රදර්ශනය වන ගොනු/බහාලුම් සංඛ්‍යාව සැකසිය හැකි අතර...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "කිනම් පිටුවෙන් පෙන්වීම ආරම්භ කළ යුතු දැයි සඳහන් කරන්න" is also a bit clunky. It's a literal translation but could be improved for clarity and natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඕනෑම පිටුවකින් පෙන්වීම ආරම්භ කිරීමට ඔබට හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'katera stran naj se začne prikazovati' is grammatically awkward. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: katero stran želite začeti prikazyvati

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'фолдера' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'фолдери'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: фолдери

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'која страница ц́е почети да се приказује' could be more naturally phrased. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: која страница да се приказује

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "koja stranica će početi da se prikazuje" is awkward and doesn't accurately convey the English meaning of "specify which page to start displaying". A more natural translation would be something like "odredite sa koje strane da počnete da prikazujete" or "odredite prvu stranicu za prikaz".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odredite sa koje strane da počnete da prikazujete

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "as well as specify which page to start displaying" is a bit clunky in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be "hangi sayfadan başlamak istediğinizi" or something similar.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bir sayfada görüntülenen dosya / klasör sayısını ve hangi sayfadan başlamak istediğinizi belirleyebilirsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'You can specify...' is translated as 'Можна вказати...'. While technically correct, a more natural and fluent translation might be 'Ви можете вказати...' (Vy mozhete vkazaty...) which aligns better with common usage in Ukrainian technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ви можете вказати кількість файлів/папок, які буде показано на одній сторінці, а також вказати, з якої сторінки почати показ
